data.title: Moiselle International Holdings Delays Circular Dispatch
data.description:
An update from Moiselle International Holdings ( (HK:0130) ) is now available.

Moiselle International Holdings Limited has announced a delay in the dispatch of a circular related to a connected transaction involving the issuance of Convertible Bonds. The circular, originally expected to be sent to shareholders by October 31, 2025, will now be dispatched by November 28, 2025, due to the need for additional time to finalize certain information.

data.description:
The latest announcement is out from Red Mountain Mining Ltd ( (AU:RMX) ).

data.title: Borgosesia Launches New Securitization Operations and Acquires Residence San Rossore
data.description:
Borgosesia S.p.A. ( (IT:BO) ) has shared an update.

Borgosesia S.p.A. has initiated two new securitization operations, Janus and Euclide, aiming to raise a total of €170 million. The company also acquired the entire capital of Pisa S.R. S.r.l., the owner of Residence San Rossore, for an enterprise value of €7 million, enhancing its portfolio in a region with strong tourist appeal.

The most recent analyst rating on (IT:BO) stock is a Buy with a EUR2.50 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Borgosesia S.p.A. stock, see the IT:BO Stock Forecast page.

More about Borgosesia S.p.A.

Borgosesia S.p.A. is a company listed on Euronext Milan, specializing in investments in alternative assets. The company focuses on securitization operations and real estate investments.

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: €22.51M

data.title: Keihanshin Building Co., Ltd. Announces Share Buyback to Enhance Capital Efficiency
data.description:
Keihanshin Building Co., Ltd. ( (JP:8818) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Keihanshin Building Co., Ltd. has announced a resolution by its Board of Directors to acquire up to 1,000,000 of its own shares through the Tokyo Stock Exchange’s off-auction trading system. This move aims to enhance capital efficiency and provide flexibility in capital policy, reflecting the company’s response to evolving market conditions.

data.title: Australian Vanadium Issues New Securities in Compliance with Regulatory Standards
data.description:
Australian Vanadium ( (AU:AVL) ) has shared an update.

Australian Vanadium Limited has issued new quoted securities without disclosure to investors, in compliance with Section 708A(5) of the Corporations Act 2001. This move indicates the company’s adherence to regulatory requirements and its commitment to maintaining transparency with stakeholders, potentially impacting its market operations and investor relations positively.

The most recent analyst rating on (AU:AVL) stock is a Buy with a A$0.06 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Australian Vanadium stock, see the AU:AVL Stock Forecast page.

More about Australian Vanadium

Australian Vanadium Limited operates in the mining industry, focusing on the extraction and processing of vanadium, a critical mineral used in steel production and energy storage solutions. The company is positioned to leverage the growing demand for vanadium in various industrial applications.

data.title: E2 Metals Director Adjusts Investment Portfolio
data.description:
E2 Metals Ltd. ( (AU:USL) ) has shared an announcement.

E2 Metals Ltd. has announced a change in the director’s interest, specifically for Todd Jarrad Williams, who has converted 2,000,000 unlisted options and 2,000,000 unlisted performance rights into fully paid ordinary shares. data.title: GoFintech Extends Loan Capitalisation Deadline and Delays Circular Dispatch
data.description:
An announcement from GoFintech Innovation Limited ( (HK:0290) ) is now available.

GoFintech Quantum Innovation Limited has announced a further extension of the Long Stop Date for its Loan Capitalisation Agreement, now set for 30 November 2025, due to additional time needed to fulfill the Conditions Precedent. This extension, agreed upon after negotiations with the Lender, indicates ongoing efforts to meet the necessary conditions for the transaction, potentially impacting the company’s financial structuring and stakeholder interests. Additionally, there is a delay in dispatching the Circular to shareholders, which will include detailed information about the Loan Capitalisation and related advisories.

The most recent analyst rating on (HK:0290) stock is a Hold with a HK$2.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on GoFintech Innovation Limited stock, see the HK:0290 Stock Forecast page.

More about GoFintech Innovation Limited

GoFintech Quantum Innovation Limited, formerly known as GoFintech Innovation Limited, is a company incorporated in the Cayman Islands with limited liability. It operates in the fintech industry, focusing on innovative financial technology solutions.

data.description:
IMC Exploration Group Plc ( (GB:IMC) ) just unveiled an announcement.

IMC Exploration Group Plc has announced that it currently has 780,677,508 ordinary shares in issue, with no shares held in treasury. data.title: SynAct Pharma to Engage in Strategic Discussions at BioEurope 2025
data.description:
SynAct Pharma AB ( (SE:SYNACT) ) has provided an announcement.

SynAct Pharma AB announced its participation in the BioEurope 2025 conference in Vienna, a major event for the life sciences sector with over 5,700 delegates. The company aims to discuss potential collaborations for its lead program, Resomelagon, a non-suppressive immune modulation therapy for rheumatoid arthritis and inflammation due to viral infections, highlighting its potential to support millions of patients.

More about SynAct Pharma AB

SynAct Pharma AB is a clinical-stage biotechnology company specializing in the resolution of inflammation through the selective activation of the melanocortin system. The company offers a range of oral and injectable selective melanocortin agonists designed to induce anti-inflammatory and inflammation resolution activity, helping patients achieve immune balance.

Average Trading Volume: 182,611

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: SEK1.23B
